The photograph was published by legitima: Agence-France Presse, the Washington Post, CNN, CBS News, and BBC News.
The photograph was taken by Nirmal Purja: a mountaineer attempting to climb all 14 of the 8,000-meter Himalayan peaks in a single seven-month season.
A video of the: traffic jam" on Everest, similar to the photograph, was also available via the Twitter account Everest Today.
